name: White Piece Rebellion
description:
A 9 x 9 board is occupied by black pieces. You mission is to use white pieces to flip them all until there is no black piece left.

There are two ways to flip enemy (black) pieces. One is to subvert two enemy pieces by inserting one white piece in between them. The other way is to capture a black piece by surrounding it with two white pieces.

There are 35 levels in total. More levels might be added in the future with new piece colors.

Thanks for playing, and feel free to leave feedback!
